card.title: Cacti Plant
card.description: Cacti are succulent plants native to the New World. Known for their thick stems and spiny leaves, they are adapted to thrive in dry environments.

card.title: Cactus Plant
card.description: Cactus plants are part of the Cactaceae family. They have thick stems that store water and sharp spines for protection.

card.title: Aloe Vera Plant
card.description: Aloe Vera is a succulent plant species. Known for its health benefits, it's often used in medicines and cosmetics.

card.title: Succulent Plant
card.description: Succulents are plants with fleshy, thickened leaves or stems that are adapted to store water. They are perfect for dry environments.

card.title: Succulent Plant
card.description: Succulents are plants with fleshy, thickened leaves or stems that are adapted to store water. They are perfect for dry environments.

card.title: Green Plant
card.description: Green plants are a broad category of plants that are known for their lush foliage. They add a touch of nature to any space.
